name: 古瓊昇
objective:
1. 靜電場：電荷、電場、電場強度、電位等基本概念；高斯定律、電位能和靜電場的計算等。2. 靜電場中的導體：導體內的電場分佈、導體的電荷分佈、等電位面和電容等。3. 靜電場中的介質：極化和極化向量、電容率、介質中的電場和能量等。4. 磁場：磁場的基本概念、磁感應強度、比奧 - 薛定律、磁通量和安培定律等。5. 電磁感應：法拉第電磁感應定律、極化感應、感應電動勢、自感和互感等。6. 麥克斯韋方程組：麥克斯韋方程組的形式和物理意義；電磁波的傳播、偏振和功率等。7. 電磁學應用：電磁學在電路、天線、電磁波傳播、光學等方面的應用。
Course Title:Electromagnetiss
I. Introduction to Electromagnetics
Overview of electromagnetics and its applications
Maxwell's equations and the fundamental laws of electromagnetics
Electromagnetic wave propagation and characteristics

II. Electrostatics
Coulomb's law and electric field intensity
Electric potential and Gauss's law
Capacitance and dielectric materials

III. Magnetostatics
Biot-Savart law and magnetic field intensity
Ampere's law and magnetic flux density
Magnetic materials and inductance

IV. Electromagnetic Waves
Electromagnetic wave equation and wave propagation
Plane waves and polarization
Reflection, refraction, and transmission of electromagnetic waves

V. Transmission Lines
Transmission line theory and equations
Types of transmission lines (coaxial, microstrip)
Characteristic impedance, impedance matching

VI. Waveguides
Introduction to waveguide theory
Waveguide modes and propagation
Waveguide components and applications

VII. Antenna Theory
Antenna fundamentals and radiation mechanism
Antenna types (dipole, monopole, loop, horn, etc.)
Antenna parameters and radiation patterns
